item.title: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.8.6.1
item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.8.6.1
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 22 Apr 2022 09:38:32 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Monitor and Control application inheritng from Instrument Framework and SMO
- Log instrument status to the PGSQL database.
- UI and API for controlling magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (PPMS2 only)

Release Notes: - Update to Instrument Framework v1.11.3.2
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: LEIDEN TC v1.0.5.1

Product: LEIDEN TC v1.0.5.1
Company: LevyLab

Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Tools used by LevyLab to interact with Leiden Temperature Control (TC)

[Instrument.TC.MNK.lvclass]
[Instrument.TC.CF.lvclass]
- APIs that overrides "Get Temperature.vi" method of Instrument.Cryostat.lvclass

Release Notes: - Update to Instrument Framework v1.11.3.2
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.15.0.1
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.15.0.1
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 21 Apr 2022 19:21:40 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462). This version is configured to handle multiple cards (up to 16) for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO. You can configure a number of analog outputs (up to 32) to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with DC offsets. Each of the analog inputs (up to 32) can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.15.0]
- First release *inheriting* from the Instrument Framework (v1.11.3.2) (Issue #41)!
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Oxford-VRM v1.6.4.1
item.description:
Product: Oxford-VRM v1.6.4.1
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Thu, 21 Apr 2022 14:33:10 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for controlling the Oxford VRM PS that controls the CF900's 3D magnet

Release Notes: - Update to Instrument Framework v1.11.3.2 (fixes issues with PGSQL logging)
- Change Get Magnet.vi to directly ask SMO for value (backup to asking PGSQL)
- Add Get Magnet Vector Field API
- Change UI from 1.0 to 2.0 s getAll timout
- Minor changes to Handle Command variant to string
item.dc:creator: Levylab
